name: Fey Revenant
description: The Fey Revenant embodies the cunning and danger of the fey realm, featuring a shadowy appearance with thorny spikes along its body. It can move through shadows and has a ghostly aura.
memorable: Its ability to teleport through shadows and damage through touch makes it both unpredictable and perilous in combat.
goals: Typically preys on the living and seeks revenge on its enemies.
relations: Often associated with other fey creatures or as a servant to powerful fey lords.
environment: Typically found in dark forests, shadowy glades, or places of strong fey influence.
strengths: High dexterity and constitution, magical resistance, and impressive stealth skills.
weaknesses: Sensitive to sunlight, suffering disadvantages on attacks and perception checks in bright light.
attacks: Attacks with a shortsword or longbow, adding poison damage, and can restrain enemies with icy shadows.
most_powerful_ability: The Shadow Traveler ability allows it to teleport and avoid danger swiftly.
senses: Can see through magical darkness and has darkvision up to 120 feet.
skills: Excels in stealth and perception, allowing it to avoid detection and notice hidden threats.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition.
Resistant to bludgeoning and piercing damage.
Thorn Body ability punishes melee attackers.
Shadow Sight enables it to see in magical darkness.
Can use Queen's Grasp to restrain and damage enemies.
test_queries: large fey creature that teleports from darkness
lawful evil fey with thorny body
stealthy monster that attacks in shadows
